content: this project is for a pocket shawl in the 6-day kid blanket pattern the shawl is created with a straight start and the chevrons are built up from the chain the pockets are worked separately and attached with the border the pattern is easily resized shown in lion brand mandala 1 but can be made in a variety of yarns and weights this is a very adaptable pattern 1 https //shrsl com/19k2f
